```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = '..')

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(magrittr)
library(data.table)
```


```{r, results = 'asis'}
summary <- readRDS('output/2-rsf/summaryRSF.Rds')
summary[, {
  print(kable(.SD, format = 'latex', 
              booktabs = TRUE, linesep = '') %>% 
          kable_styling(latex_options = 'scale_down'))
  (1)
}, by = .(species, season)]

```
